Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Quo Eraso Aparthotel in Madrid (Ventas), you'll be convenient to Las Ventas and Prado Museum. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Fundacion Juan March and Sports Palace Madrid.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 31 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

With a stay at Quo Eraso Aparthotel in Madrid (Ventas), you'll be convenient to Las Ventas and Prado Museum. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Fundacion Juan March and Sports Palace Madrid.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Ventas - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Fundacion Juan March - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Sports Palace Madrid - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Fundacion Lazaro Galdiano - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Lazaro Galdiano Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
U.S. Embassy - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
ABC Serrano - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
La Caixa Foundation - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
National Auditorium of Music - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Museum of Public Art - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Torrespana - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Museum of Natural Sciences - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Sorolla Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Plaza de Colon - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
National Archaeological Museum of Spain - 1.9 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Quo Eraso Aparthotel is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Quo Eraso Aparthotel is Madrid (MAD-Barajas) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi.
